on_load-crowd-mini-check.doc: because there's a tiny window where you might reload map after elders leave but before crowd does

on_load-crowd-check.doc: this is not set to check 'tuesdayd' because you might want the crowd inside and otherwise leave the tuesday cutscene inert

cutscene-tuesday2.doc: The day has come! You might have more hair that didn't used to

artifacts-eval.doc: Wait, was that the last one?

cutscene-artifacts-eval-good.doc: But I saw them touch all of them?
Oh! Oh, good heavens, is that? Ring Zero?
That ring isn't normal! / but, perhaps....
Oh, but this is good news, isn't it?
You can fix things at last!
But the town is all glitched!
Yes, exactly! That ring hack! / you see...

empty-lodge.doc: just in case I didn't catch all the 'empty-lodge' scripts and need the rest to happen, too

show_dialog-timmy-start.doc: Something really weird happened to my book!

show_dialog-timmy-start-normal.doc: Oh! How nice! Much easier to read!

show_dialog-timmy-start-s.doc: I want to get a high jump gold medal!

bypass-tuesday.doc: possibly you can't teleport an entity twice in one tick... though why then does this one work?

debug-disable-tuesday-walkup.doc: so you don't accidentally trigger walk-to-lodge if you set all flags to false before engaging the lodge
was set true above; set to false now so the lodge crowd isn't hidden upon load, so you can voluntarily start the cutscene and it'll look okay

debug-undisable-tuesday.doc: so you don't accidentally trigger walk-to-lodge if you set all to false before engaging the lodge

debug-bypass-tuesday-but-enable-hintman.doc: set to true in above copied script

Tuesday bypassed. Prepare for hintman
cutscene.
